item.title: [Python] Learn the design pattern Singleton with Python
item.description: As a material for learning GoF design patterns, the book "[Expanded and Revised Edition Introduction to Design Patterns in Java Language](https://www.hyuki.com/dp/)" seems to be helpful. However, since the examples taken up are JAVA-based, I tried a similar practice in Python to deepen my understanding. â– Singleton The Singleton pattern (singleton pattern) is one of the design patterns in an object-oriented computer program. Defined by the GoF (Gang of Four). The Singleton pattern is a design pattern that guarantees that only one instance of the class will be created.
